blocks.subject: Fixed Income Account Profile
text: As per Paul and my conversation with you this morning, below you will please
find a brief summary of the type of account we want to establish.
Paul will forward this e-mail to Greg Campbell at Chase, as well.
Please give us a call at your convenience.
Three principal currencies: USD, CAD and GBP (would anticipate Euro, as
Repo Settlement clearance account between counterparties
Average size 10-25 Million, could go to $100 million
May have fails or small delivery differences
May have a custodial position for 2-3 days
Hold cash in account of residual P&L or wire back if significant
Advance notice for settlement instructions required? Domestic? Foreign?
Intraday draft facility or we cover
